LABEL: 0x1A4
STRING: 「It's kind of like telling a round of ghost stories.」

LABEL: 0x1D5
STRING: She put the flashlight in the center while the three of us surrounded it.

LABEL: 0x20D
STRING: The dimly lit room did have a certain flavor to it, I guess.

LABEL: 0x249
STRING: It was like forming a circle around a candle in the dark.

LABEL: 0x287
STRING: Hiragino still didn't seem to be feeling well. He didn't talk much.

LABEL: 0x2C7
STRING: To make up for him, Touri maintained a high tension worth of several people by herself.

LABEL: 0x37D
STRING: 「I may not look like it, but I really like scary stories!」

LABEL: 0x3BA
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x43C
STRING: 「Ah, you don't believe me!」

LABEL: 0x469
STRING: 「Well, you know...」

LABEL: 0x48D
STRING: I remembered what happened at the lounge yesterday.

LABEL: 0x4B5
STRING: After hearing that she was afraid of Heike crabs, I had a hard time believing she actually enjoyed scary stories.

LABEL: 0x585
STRING: 「Hey, that's not it!」

LABEL: 0x604
STRING: 「That was when I was a kid! I'm fine with them now.」

LABEL: 0x645
STRING: She turned bright red and objected.

LABEL: 0x66F
STRING: 「Sorry, sorry.」

LABEL: 0x69C
STRING: 「Geez...」

LABEL: 0x6B6
STRING: 「Well, since we're on the subject, do you know any horror stories?」

LABEL: 0x745
STRING: 「If possible, something to do with the sea.」

LABEL: 0x776
STRING: 「A horror story about the sea...?」

LABEL: 0x798
STRING: Hmmm...

LABEL: 0x7AE
STRING: Somehow, I felt like there were plenty of those.

LABEL: 0x7DC
STRING: The sea and monsters were very compatible to begin with.

LABEL: 0x80C
STRING: It was the next frontier for humanity after conquering the land,

LABEL: 0x85C
STRING: and it was still not fully understood.

LABEL: 0x88A
STRING: There were monster legends, mysterious deaths, drifting spirits, and everything in between.

LABEL: 0x8C6
STRING: Choosing just one out of them would be hard.

LABEL: 0x915
STRING: 「You don't know any, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x95E
STRING: 「Okay, this is a famous story, but――」

LABEL: 0x98E
STRING: 「Do you know what the Bermuda Triangle is?」

LABEL: 0xA38
STRING: 「Bermuda...?」

LABEL: 0xA5A
STRING: 「Hmm, I think I've heard the name somewhere before.」

LABEL: 0xA95
STRING: It had been a long time since it was a popular topic, but even high schoolers these days knew about it.

LABEL: 0xAE3
STRING: As I thought, the name alone was incredibly recognizable.

LABEL: 0xB2F
STRING: Of course, there was no way Hiragino wouldn't know about it.

LABEL: 0xB5F
STRING: And not just because he was a crew member of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0xBF9
STRING: 「The Sea of Evil...」

LABEL: 0xC17
STRING: 「There are several places in the world that are called that.」

LABEL: 0xC4F
STRING: 「Waters you can't come back alive from, getting cursed if you go in, or where monsters live...」

LABEL: 0xC95
STRING: 「Among these legends, the most famous is the Bermuda Triangle.」

LABEL: 0xCFC
STRING: 「A Sea of Evil...」

LABEL: 0xD1F
STRING: Touri repeated the exaggerated name.

LABEL: 0xDA8
STRING: 「You can form a triangle by connecting the tip of the Florida Peninsula, Puerto Rico, and the Bermuda Islands.」

LABEL: 0xDFA
STRING: 「There are legends that have been passed down in that area for a long time.」

LABEL: 0xE36
STRING: 「That ships and airplanes that enter the area disappear without a trace...」

LABEL: 0xEB6
STRING: Or at least, that's what my sister had told me.

LABEL: 0xF04
STRING: I'd heard it so many times since I was young that I still remembered it well.

LABEL: 0xF48
STRING: 「The cause is completely unknown...」

LABEL: 0xF6C
STRING: 「However, from the few survivor reports, we can see a few things in common.」

LABEL: 0xFCB
STRING: 「Something in common?」

LABEL: 0x1004
STRING: 「First, there's the abnormality with the gauges.」

LABEL: 0x1028
STRING: 「Compass needles and other instruments that represent the ship's state all go haywire...」

LABEL: 0x107A
STRING: 「It was seen as a sign of a disappearance phenomenon.」

LABEL: 0x10B7
STRING: 「It's like the Sea of Trees at Mt. Fuji...」

LABEL: 0x10E6
STRING: 「And――」

LABEL: 0x1102
STRING: 「There have been sightings of a mysterious light appearing.」

LABEL: 0x1149
STRING: 「Light――」

LABEL: 0x1170
STRING: 「Light, huh...」

LABEL: 0x12BB
STRING: Hiragino reacted sharply to that word.

LABEL: 0x12E5
STRING: I didn't say anything.

LABEL: 0x1307
STRING: 「Why do people disappear in that area...?」

LABEL: 0x133F
STRING: 「In order to investigate the cause, various theories have been formed all over the world.」

LABEL: 0x1383
STRING: 「I say theories, but...」

LABEL: 0x13AD
STRING: 「They were things like the alien cause theory, or the wormhole theory.」

LABEL: 0x13E3
STRING: 「They were all too crude to be called proper theories and were mostly just nonsense.」

LABEL: 0x142D
STRING: 「They were in the realm of ridiculous science, but...」

LABEL: 0x1470
STRING: 「――There was also the methane hydrate theory.」

LABEL: 0x14B3
STRING: Methane hydrate――

LABEL: 0x14D7
STRING: I'd heard the word a lot over the past few days, but it was just a coincidence that it also had something to do with the Bermuda Triangle.

LABEL: 0x15AF
STRING: 「What do you mean by that?」

LABEL: 0x15EA
STRING: 「If I remember correctly, it's a theory advocated by a physicist or something...」

LABEL: 0x1620
STRING: 「It was where methane hydrate caused a rapid outbreak of methane bubbles.」

LABEL: 0x166A
STRING: 「The theory was that maybe the ship lost its buoyancy due to the difference in density between it and the surrounding seawater and sank.」

LABEL: 0x16B4
STRING: 「The plane crashes were easier to explain.」

LABEL: 0x16EA
STRING: 「The plane's engine sucked in the methane, which caused an incomplete combustion due to lack of oxygen.」

LABEL: 0x1736
STRING: 「That caused the engines to lose power, crashing the plane.」

LABEL: 0x17C5
STRING: 「Well, it's a pretty convincing theory.」

LABEL: 0x1808
STRING: 「Methane...」

LABEL: 0x1824
STRING: 「That sounds complicated... What do you think, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x185F
STRING: 「Well, I guess it's not impossible.」

LABEL: 0x188F
STRING: It was a pretty convincing theory in its own way.

LABEL: 0x18B5
STRING: It might be right, but there wasn't enough proof to be sure.

LABEL: 0x1914
STRING: 「That said, if that is the truth...」

LABEL: 0x194A
STRING: 「As long as there's methane hydrate in the sea, the same phenomenon should occur in other areas as well.」

LABEL: 0x199E
STRING: 「There have been no such reports, and this theory would leave us with a wreckage of the ship involved in the accident.」

LABEL: 0x1A53
STRING: 「It can't explain why a ship or an airplane would disappear without a trace.」

LABEL: 0x1B03
STRING: 「Then...」

LABEL: 0x1B2E
STRING: 「In the end, it's still a mystery.」

LABEL: 0x1B5F
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x1B7E
STRING: For some reason, Touris's shoulders slumped.

LABEL: 0x1BE0
STRING: She continued to stare at the flashlight like that.

LABEL: 0x1C1D
STRING: 「I wonder where the people who disappeared went.」

LABEL: 0x1C68
STRING: The people who went somewhere.

LABEL: 0x1C92
STRING: The people who disappeared.

LABEL: 0x1CB4
STRING: The people who should have been there and who had built up their own history up to that point.

LABEL: 0x1CFA
STRING: They had suddenly disappeared, and we might not be able to do anything about it.

LABEL: 0x1D46
STRING: However, where in the world had they gone?

LABEL: 0x1DEC
STRING: 「Maybe...」

LABEL: 0x1E6B
STRING: 「Like Urashima Tarou...」

LABEL: 0x1E8F
STRING: 「They might return in a few years.」

LABEL: 0x1ED2
STRING: 「Now that you mention it, I've heard of a time slip theory.」

LABEL: 0x1F2B
STRING: 「Is this about the Bermuda Triangle, too?」

LABEL: 0x1F62
STRING: 「Well, it is, but...」

LABEL: 0x1F90
STRING: The people who disappeared at sea appeared exactly as they were, in a completely different time and space.

LABEL: 0x1FEC
STRING: Stories like that were all over the world, from east to west.

LABEL: 0x202E
STRING: I'd figured most of them were probably made up, but...

LABEL: 0x2068
STRING: There may be a reason why there were so many similar stories.

LABEL: 0x217D
STRING: 「In that case, there's an even more famous story.」

LABEL: 0x21B5
STRING: 「I'm talking about the Mary Celeste.」

LABEL: 0x224B
STRING: 「Mary...? Is that a person's name?」

LABEL: 0x2278
STRING: Hiragino gently shook his head at Touri's innocent question.

LABEL: 0x22C1
STRING: 「In 1872, a ghost ship was discovered drifting across the Atlantic.」

LABEL: 0x23CC
STRING: 「A ghost ship?!」

LABEL: 0x242A
STRING: A ghost ship.

LABEL: 0x2440
STRING: Her words brought to mind a rotting boat floating in the fog.

LABEL: 0x248A
STRING: A godforsaken ship suddenly appearing in a monochrome sea.

LABEL: 0x252C
STRING: 「That ship's name was Mary Celeste.」

LABEL: 0x2560
STRING: 「When they discovered it, there wasn't a single crew member on board.」

LABEL: 0x2594
STRING: 「There was still warm tea and breakfast on the tables.」

LABEL: 0x25CE
STRING: 「When investigated further, they found that the compass had been destroyed, and the sextant and chronometer were missing.」

LABEL: 0x2633
STRING: 「What's a sextant?」

LABEL: 0x2652
STRING: 「It's a tool for measuring the altitude and horizontal angle of celestial bodies and landmarks.」

LABEL: 0x2698
STRING: 「And a chronometer is a high-precision clock designed to keep time correctly, even on a rocking ship.」

LABEL: 0x270D
STRING: 「Hmm... You sure know a lot.」

LABEL: 0x2736
STRING: This, too, was knowledge that my sister had imparted to me.

LABEL: 0x284E
STRING: 「In other words――」

LABEL: 0x286A
STRING: 「When the Mary Celeste was discovered, it was a ship separated from space and time.」

LABEL: 0x28D1
STRING: Space and time. There was no way to measure either of them.

LABEL: 0x2905
STRING: It was a single ship isolated from others,

LABEL: 0x2937
STRING: that continued to drift alone through the sea.

LABEL: 0x2961
STRING: A ghost ship separated from the real world.

LABEL: 0x2985
STRING: The Mary Celeste――

LABEL: 0x2AD3
STRING: 「But isn't that just fiction?」

LABEL: 0x2B07
STRING: 「I think I read about it in a novel or something.」

LABEL: 0x2B43
STRING: Hiragino nodded readily.

LABEL: 0x2BD7
STRING: 「It's true that the Mary Celeste incident is often the subject of fiction.」

LABEL: 0x2C21
STRING: 「And with each story, its image was strengthened, and it was carved into people's minds as a mysterious incident.」

LABEL: 0x2C79
STRING: 「One of the most famous people to write about it was Conan Doyle, the author of Holmes.」

LABEL: 0x2D2D
STRING: 「Oh, so it was all made up?」

LABEL: 0x2D64
STRING: She breathed a sigh of relief.

LABEL: 0x2DF2
STRING: 「No, that's not necessarily the case.」

LABEL: 0x2E1A
STRING: 「Certainly, some of the legends surrounding the Mary Celeste

LABEL: 0x2E62
STRING: have been proven to be fiction.」

LABEL: 0x2E9C
STRING: 「The freshly made breakfast and hot tea, among other things, were parts that Conan Doyle had added.」

LABEL: 0x2FB4
STRING: 「But in reality, all the sailors were actually missing.」

LABEL: 0x2FEC
STRING: 「It was also true that the compass was destroyed, and that the sextant and chronometer were gone.」

LABEL: 0x3048
STRING: 「It was a vast ocean, and there was no GPS or anything like there is now.」

LABEL: 0x3083
STRING: 「Measuring time and location is one of the most important things on a voyage.」

LABEL: 0x30D3
STRING: 「There's no way they'd destroy something so crucial to the ship.」

LABEL: 0x318C
STRING: 「Then the missing sailors...」

LABEL: 0x3226
STRING: 「They were never found, of course.」

LABEL: 0x32F9
STRING: Silence.

LABEL: 0x330D
STRING: No one could say anything.

LABEL: 0x3339
STRING: An ominous atmosphere pervaded the room.

LABEL: 0x335B
STRING: A sunken ship.

LABEL: 0x3373
STRING: The Mary Celeste.

LABEL: 0x3395
STRING: A drifting ghost ship.

LABEL: 0x347C
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x349A
STRING: 「I guess the topic was a bit inappropriate.」

LABEL: 0x3536
STRING: 「No, it was really interesting!」

LABEL: 0x35C3
STRING: 「Thank you, Hiragino-san!」

LABEL: 0x35F0
STRING: Touri smiled at the apologetic Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x36E9
STRING: ――I wondered where the people who had disappeared went.

LABEL: 0x3731
STRING: A sunken ship.

LABEL: 0x3749
STRING: Was the <SHEEP III>...

LABEL: 0x3766
STRING: ...A ship that had fallen into the Bermuda Triangle?

LABEL: 0x37A0
STRING: Or, was it the Mary Celeste?

LABEL: 0x37D0
STRING: Where would this drifting ship reach?

LABEL: 0x3871
STRING: In the midst of the silence, there was a sound of the door opening.
